page.title: 15Life is .....
page.content:
Life is like writing a computer program.It has easy parts and hard parts,just like the easy times and hard times in life.Writing a computer program can have setbacks too just like life has.A setback in writing a computer program is when you type something in and it doesn't work.A setback in life is when you fall out with a friend.As you get older a setback in life could be not being able to get a job or having a job and losing it.These setbacks have to be overcome if you are going to get on in life.If you overcome these setbacks you should live a happy life.
David Robertson
Age 11yrs.11mnths.
